name: Soul Train
description:
Unzip and run for lots of skeleton fun. The exe is called BONETRAIN. Don't worry about it.

Best played with a controller: left and right triggers to move, a to advance through dialogue, start to close.

On keyboard, you can use the arrow keys to move, enter to advance through dialogue, and escape to close.

Created by Tough Little Oeuf for TOjam13: Matt Carr, Laura Klamot, Max Manco and Sedona Parnham.
